name: Headphone knights
description:
Author's note: This is the first game I've ever made, so it's not very good...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

You live in a futuristic village in the year 2065. You have just been accepted to a society that guards the village called "Headphone knights".
As you make your way to the Headphone knights headquarters you notice that the village has been invaded by these strange red creatures.
When you enter the headquarters you find the other members asimilated by the red creatures. So now it's up to you to save everyone.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard controls:

Arrow keys- move
Down key- crouch
Shift- jump
Space- action
F1- restart level
F2- back to menu
F5- save
F6- load
Esc- Close the game

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Xbox controller controls:

Joystick- move
Down- crouch
A- jump
X- action
Dpad- select
Start button- restart level
Back button- close the game
Right shoulder- save
Left shoulder- load
